Articles.Content:
That\'s the one.

But really, leaving because of one thread.

I saw some of GoDamnit\'s final comments here. Pretty funny stuff, actually. He seemed REALLY angry that there was an MLP thread. I can\'t believe he\'s never coming back just because of something so stupid.

I saw some of GoDamnit\'s final comments here. Pretty funny stuff, actually. He seemed REALLY angry that there was an MLP thread. I can\'t believe he\'s never coming back just because of something so stupid.

I find it funny that GoDamnit left because of a thread that would make things better for both sides, instead of the MLP fans posting pony reacton images all over the forum, and the MLP haters (I would be one of the neutral people, I don\'t like MLP but certainly have had fun watching other children\'s programs) getting angry at them...

I saw some of GoDamnit\'s final comments here. Pretty funny stuff, actually. He seemed REALLY angry that there was an MLP thread. I can\'t believe he\'s never coming back just because of something so stupid.

Could you give me a link to his profile?

I must see this.

Could you give me a link to his profile?

I must see this.

Sure, let me find it

--EDIT--

I can\'t use the search bar right now, as it\'s down, but here is one of GoDamnit\'s last comments here:

WTF?

You mean to tell me you sad monkeys actually watch this crap?

If any boy was caught watching girly crap like that when I was 16, you would immediately be shunned and outcast as a poofter!

Sure, let me find it

--EDIT--

I can\'t use the search bar right now, as it\'s down, but here is one of GoDamnit\'s last comments here:

Wow. Just wow, no offense, but what an idiot.

Basically:

Guy 1: Hey guys, which is the best pony?

Guy 2: TWILIGHT!

Guy 3: -walks in- STOP HAVING FUN!

Wow. Just wow, no offense, but what an idiot.

Oh look, a perfectly relevant gif.

Wow. Just wow, no offense, but what an idiot.

Basically:

Guy 1: Hey guys, which is the best pony?

Guy 2: TWILIGHT!

Guy 3: -walks in- STOP HAVING FUN!

That\'s 100% true

Twilight is the best pony
Im so lucky i was at my cousins birthday yesterday then found a Show Real Miss cheerilee Plushie i asked who\'s it was nobody answered so i took it
Wow. Stealing other people\'s plushies. That\'s low.

Wow. Stealing other people\'s plushies. That\'s low.

I asked Who owned it i asked everyone there no one answered

According to Mishnaic and Halachic (Two Jewish lawbooks) law, that\'s legal. If you ask if something is someone\'s at least three times in different places in the area you find it where there are people (i,e, three rooms of a building), then you can take it.

According to Mishnaic and Halachic (Two Jewish lawbooks) law, that\'s legal. If you ask if something is someone\'s at least three times in different places in the area you find it where there are people (i,e, three rooms of a building), then you can take it.

That\'s actually... Quite interesting...
Instead of Rick rolling people why don\'t we pony roll people? Link em to the theme song!
New rainbow dash avatar! twlightss till my fav pony though.
Pft, some of us don\'t feel the need to announce our avatar changes. :

http://www.fimfiction.net/index.php?view=category&search=a+little+twist

Please read.

Unlike most other \'human in Equestra\' fics, where the characters remain human in Equestria, this guy\'s a pony.

So it\'s a fanfic with a human who\'s a pony? Sure, that makes sense. ;P

So it\'s a fanfic with a human who\'s a pony? Sure, that makes sense. ;P

It\'s basically \'Ponyfall\' backwards: A human wakes up in Equestria, just in a different body.

Agreed with luigi.

Mods, please don\'t ban this thread. It will help reduce the pony spam by a lot.

Yes agreed with you two as well. Let the ponies be here.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Lol nice this made my day

My Pony-Gland exploded the other day when in the 'Recently Added' part of Netflix I saw Ponies, 26 episodes of original(not the ORIGINAL original but the GOOD original), pure ponies.
